Announcement.description: Represents an announcement set by an administrator.
Announcement.exampleJson:
{ "all_day" : false, "content" : "

Looks like there was an issue processing audio attachments without embedded art since yesterday due to an experimental new feature. That issue has now been fixed, so you may see older posts with audio from other servers pop up in your feeds now as they are being finally properly processed. Sorry!

", "emojis" : [], "ends_at" : null, "id" : "8", "mentions" : [], "published_at" : "2020-07-03T01:27:38.726Z", "reactions" : [ { "count" : 9, "me" : false, "name" : "bongoCat", "static_url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/067/715/static/fdba57dff7576d53.png", "url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/067/715/original/fdba57dff7576d53.png" }, { "count" : 1, "me" : false, "name" : "thonking", "static_url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/098/690/static/a8d36edc4a7032e8.png", "url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/098/690/original/a8d36edc4a7032e8.png" }, { "count" : 1, "me" : false, "name" : "AAAAAA", "static_url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/071/387/static/AAAAAA.png", "url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/071/387/original/AAAAAA.png" }, { "count" : 1, "me" : true, "name" : "🤔" } ], "read" : true, "starts_at" : null, "statuses" : [], "tags" : [], "updated_at" : "2020-07-03T01:27:38.752Z" }

ScheduledStatus.description: Represents a status that will be published at a future scheduled date.
ScheduledStatus.exampleJson:
{
   "id" : "1",
   "media_attachments" : [],
   "params" : {
      "application_id" : 3,
      "idempotency" : null,
      "in_reply_to_id" : null,
      "language" : null,
      "media_ids" : null,
      "poll" : null,
      "scheduled_at" : null,
      "sensitive" : null,
      "spoiler_text" : null,
      "text" : "test post",
      "visibility" : null,
      "with_rate_limit" : false
   },
   "scheduled_at" : "2022-09-29T00:00:00.000Z"
}

properties.name: params[language]

properties.description: ID of the Application that posted the status.
When the status will be scheduled. This will be null because the status is only scheduled once.

properties.description: Idempotency key to prevent duplicate statuses.

properties.description: Media that will be attached when the status is posted.

Status.description: Represents a status posted by an account.
Status.exampleJson:
{ "account" : { "acct" : "Gargron", "avatar" : "https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/000/000/001/original/d96d39a0abb45b92.jpg", "avatar_static" : "https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/000/000/001/original/d96d39a0abb45b92.jpg", "bot" : false, "created_at" : "2016-03-16T14:34:26.392Z", "discoverable" : true, "display_name" : "Eugen", "emojis" : [], "fields" : [ { "name" : "Patreon", "value" : "https://www.patreon.com/mastodonhttps://zeonfederated.comDeveloper of Mastodon and administrator of mastodon.social. I post service announcements, development updates, and personal stuff.

Admin::Measure.description: Represents quantitative data about the server.
Admin::Measure.name: Admin::Measure

properties.description: The unique keystring for the requested measure.
properties.name: key

properties.description: The units associated with this data item's value, if applicable.
properties.name: unit
total
properties.description: The numeric total associated with the requested measure.

properties.name: human_value
properties.description: A human-readable formatted value for this data item.

The numeric total associated with the requested measure, in the previous period. Previous period is calculated by subtracting the start_at and end_at dates, then offsetting both start and end dates backwards by the length of the time period.
properties.name: previous_total
data
properties.description: The data available for the requested measure, split into daily buckets.
Midnight on the requested day in the time period.
properties.name: data[][date]
data[][value]
properties.description: The numeric value for the requested measure.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The account id.
The username of the account, not including domain.
properties.name: username
acct
properties.description: The Webfinger account URI. Equal to `username` for local users, or `username@domain` for remote users.

properties.name: url
properties.description: The location of the user's profile page.

properties.name: display_name
properties.description: The profile's display name.

properties.name: note
properties.description: The profile's bio or description.
An image icon that is shown next to statuses and in the profile.
properties.name: avatar
avatar_static
properties.description: A static version of the avatar. Equal to `avatar` if its value is a static image; different if `avatar` is an animated GIF.

properties.name: header
properties.description: An image banner that is shown above the profile and in profile cards.

properties.name: header_static
properties.description: A static version of the header. Equal to `header` if its value is a static image; different if `header` is an animated GIF.
Whether the account manually approves follow requests.
properties.name: locked

properties.description: Additional metadata attached to a profile as name-value pairs.
properties.name: fields
emojis
properties.description: Custom emoji entities to be used when rendering the profile.
Indicates that the account may perform automated actions, may not be monitored, or identifies as a robot.
properties.name: bot
group
properties.description: Indicates that the account represents a Group actor.
Whether the account has opted into discovery features such as the profile directory.
properties.name: discoverable

properties.description: Whether the local user has opted out of being indexed by search engines.
properties.name: noindex

properties.description: Indicates that the profile is currently inactive and that its user has moved to a new account.
properties.name: moved
suspended
properties.description: An extra attribute returned only when an account is suspended.

properties.name: limited
properties.description: An extra attribute returned only when an account is silenced. If true, indicates that the account should be hidden behind a warning screen.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: When the account was created.
When the most recent status was posted.
properties.name: last_status_at
statuses_count
properties.description: How many statuses are attached to this account.

properties.name: followers_count
properties.description: The reported followers of this profile.
The reported follows of this profile.
properties.name: following_count

Relationship.description: Represents the relationship between accounts, such as following / blocking / muting / etc.
Relationship.exampleJson:
{
   "blocked_by" : false,
   "blocking" : false,
   "domain_blocking" : false,
   "endorsed" : false,
   "followed_by" : true,
   "following" : true,
   "id" : "1",
   "muting" : false,
   "muting_notifications" : false,
   "note" : "",
   "notifying" : false,
   "requested" : false,
   "showing_reblogs" : true
}

ExtendedDescription.exampleJson:
{ "content" : "

For inquiries not related specifically to the operation of this server, such as press inquiries, please contact press@joinmastodon.org.

Funding

This server is crowdfunded by Patreon donations. For a list of sponsors, see joinmastodon.org.

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

Impressum

Mastodon gGmbH
Mühlenstraße 8a
14167 Berlin
Germany

E-Mail-Adresse: hello@joinmastodon.org

Vertretungsberechtigt: Eugen Rochko (Geschäftsführer)

Umsatzsteuer Identifikationsnummer (USt-ID): DE344258260

Handelsregister
Geführt bei: Amtsgericht Charlottenburg
Nummer: HRB 230086 B

", "updated_at" : "2022-11-03T04:09:07Z" }

Filter.description: Represents a user-defined filter for determining which statuses should not be shown to the user.

properties.description: The ID of the Filter in the database.
properties.name: id
title
properties.description: A title given by the user to name the filter.

properties.name: context
properties.description: The contexts in which the filter should be applied.

properties.name: expires_at
properties.description: When the filter should no longer be applied.
The action to be taken when a status matches this filter.
properties.name: filter_action
keywords
properties.description: The keywords grouped under this filter.

properties.name: statuses
properties.description: The statuses grouped under this filter.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The id of the notification in the database.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of event that resulted in the notification.
The timestamp of the notification.
properties.name: created_at
account
properties.description: The account that performed the action that generated the notification.
Status that was the object of the notification. Attached when `type` of the notification is `favourite`, `reblog`, `status`, `mention`, `poll`, or `update`.
properties.name: status

properties.description: Report that was the object of the notification. Attached when `type` of the notification is `admin.report`.
properties.name: report
